entry.title: Review: Soulcalibur V

link.Abstract: Soulcalibur V has a great look and style, but more story is needed according to Paul Chapman.
link.title: [ more ]

link.Abstract: Soulcalibur V has great visuals, but needs more character depth, according to The Province's game reviewer Paul Chapman.
link.title: Soulcalibur V

link.Abstract: Developed by Bandi-Namco’s internal Project Soul team, the latest entry in the tournament-style fighting series takes place 17 years after the events of the previous game. In Soulcalibur V, Patroklos, the son of the divine fighter Sophita locates his long lost sister Pyrrha. Together, they must battle various challengers in order to gain possession of the pure Soulcalibur sword, the only thing that can stop a new and more powerful incarnation of Nightmare from consuming the world.
link.title: Video: Soulcalibur V: Everything You Should Know

link.title: Thor: God of Thunder

link.Abstract: From the last round of Harry Potter to the return of Captain Jack Sparrow and the motivational expose of the X-Men, the summer of 2011 finds plenty of familiar faces urgently competing for your attention.
link.title: Summer Movie Preview: Blockbusters

link.Abstract: The Super Bowl gave us new peeks at some of this year’s hottest blockbusters.
link.title: Super Bowl Movie Trailers: Transformers 3, Super 8, Captain America and More

entry.content: Thor: God of Thunder brings enough gameplay, immersion and extra story lines to thrill not only comic book fans but fans of the action gaming genre as well.
